评论详情: Excellent quality and true to size. Perfect fit and every comfortable.
I love the quality and color options! Plus the sizing was spot on.
Very well made! Excellent quality fabric and very soft! Fits to size!
Nice outfit for boys , my son wore this fit  on his first day back to school. The weather was still nice with a little breeze in the air. He thought he looked cool and so did I☺️. Highly recommended

I got these for my 7 year old and he loves them.  We're in the Midwest and he's ready to wear shorts even if it's not quite warm enough, so the matching sweatshirt is a good compromise.  Both the sweatshirt and shorts fit as expected and he find them very comfortable.  The colors are as pictured.
Very cute set perfect for Spring! I’ve washed it twice and no pills, the color remains bright!
Love the quality of this outfit and color. My son loves how comfortable is. Ordered a medium for my 9 year old. It's perfect with a little room to grow.
Excelente calidad y buen diseño tal como se ve en la fotografía
